title: The Unusual Suspect
description: In this Dateline classic, investigators question if there is a serial killer in a suburb of Maryland when two mothers and their teenage daughters are murdered. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 23, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
